description: Try our easy to follow Cranberry, Black Pepper & Thyme Glazed Ham recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cranberry, Black Pepper & Thyme Glazed Ham Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the glaze, add one jar cranberry sauce, orange juice, half bunch thyme, cracked black pepper and brown sugar to a small saucepan. Cook on high heat for 5 minutes or until thick and syrupy. Remove from heat and strain.

Grease a large, deep roasting pan. Line with foil, then baking paper. Sit ham on a wire rack over roasting pan. Using a knife, slice between the rind and the fat, then using fingers carefully remove the rind in one piece. Use a sharp knife to score fat diagonally with intersecting lines, 1cm apart.
Brush ham with one third of the glaze. Bake ham, brushing with remaining glaze and pan juices every 30 minutes, for 1 hour 30 minutes or until ham is golden and sticky and all glaze has been used.
Scatter with remaining picked thyme leaves and cracked black pepper, and serve with extra jar of cranberry sauce.
